description: Defines the interface IEventHandler with pure virtual methods for handling different types of events within the WPEFramework plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling various runtime and window events, as well as ripple and state change events in the WPEFramework plugin system.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handler for runtime manager events, receives event data as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handler for window manager events, receives event data as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handler for ripple events, takes a string name and event data as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handler for state change events, receives event data as a JsonObject reference.
